uiFeatures.feature1: Use Figma to create UI designs and work closely with teams to make the user experience better.
uiFeatures.feature2: Focus on responsive design (RWD) to ensure the website looks great on all devices.
uiFeatures.feature3: Have frontend development skills, making it easier to communicate with developers and improve workflow.
uiFeatures.feature4: Familiar with UI frameworks like Ant Design and can adjust designs to fit the existing system, making development smoother.
uiFeatures.feature5: Skilled in vector illustration, adding unique and eye-catching visuals to websites.

frontEndDescription.develop1: Experienced in building multilingual websites (i18n) and implementing frontend features using React and Next.js frameworks.
frontEndDescription.develop2: Implemented responsive designs (RWD) and layouts with Tailwind CSS, and basic HTML5/CSS3 skills.
frontEndDescription.develop3: Capable of RESTful API integration and CRUD operations, handling dynamic information and multi-level structured data.
frontEndDescription.test1: Proficient in Git version control for effective project management and development tasks.
frontEndDescription.test2: Familiar with Vercel deployment processes and DNS configuration (A Record) for custom domain binding.
frontEndDescription.test3: Performed code quality checks using SonarLint to ensure security and performance.
frontEndDescription.design1: Designed UI with Figma and collaborated with stakeholders to adjust UX designs for enhanced user experiences.
frontEndDescription.design2: Possess cross-department communication skills to integrate design and development needs, delivering efficient and goal-oriented project outcomes.
